issues.description:
Reentrancy in ModifierEntrancy.airDrop() (../../../tmp/user1/contracts/swc-107-modifier-reentrancy.sol#14-16):
	External calls:
	- supportsToken() (../../../tmp/user1/contracts/swc-107-modifier-reentrancy.sol#14)
		- require(bool)(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(Nu Token)) == bank.supportsToken()) (../../../tmp/user1/contracts/swc-107-modifier-reentrancy.sol#20)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenBalance[msg.sender] += 20 (../../../tmp/user1/contracts/swc-107-modifier-reentrancy.sol#15)
	ModifierEntrancy.tokenBalance (../../../tmp/user1/contracts/swc-107-modifier-reentrancy.sol#5) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- ModifierEntrancy.airDrop() (../../../tmp/user1/contracts/swc-107-modifier-reentrancy.sol#14-16)
	- ModifierEntrancy.hasNoBalance() (../../../tmp/user1/contracts/swc-107-modifier-reentrancy.sol#25-28)
	- ModifierEntrancy.tokenBalance (../../../tmp/user1/contracts/swc-107-modifier-reentrancy.sol#5)
